page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: We have lots of kinds of{ENTERTAINMENT nowadays.Entertainment is something other people do for you.You can enjoy it in lots of places.Here are two in the house:the{RADIO}is an instrument that plays music and talks.It works by sound waves from a studio and plays on the radio.You can get different channels on it. The{T.V. }is made up of tiny chips but instead of just making a noise it also puts a picture on a screen. The{CINEMA }is a place where lots of people gather to watch a film.It is one big screen{(}like a T.V. but bigger{)}and they have a little room behind the audience from where they project the film onto the screen. { { BY{MICHAELA DEARNESS } {
